title: Jedi Apprentice

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check to see if someone is a Sith.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit a Sith, you will attack them.
- If you are visited by a Sith, they will be attacked. If they are a Sith Commanding role, you will die as well.
- Once all Sith Lords are dead, Your original town role will be given back to you. If your master dies, you will become a Jedi Knight (Post 614)
- Cannot roll naturally.

desc:
Post 614.5
*"Training to become a Jedi is not an easy challenge, and even if you succeed, it's a hard life."*
